message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $1500000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm afraid $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand that you're looking to make a deal, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering you a counteroffer of $1400000. This is the best I can do, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to pay $1200000, and I'm hoping we can meet at this price. I'm not willing to go any higher.
